examples.example: 那盘色彩鲜艳的红椒炒肉让人看了就很有食欲。

translate.english: That plate of colorful fried meat with red peppers makes people feel very appetizing when looking at it.

examples.example: 妈妈用红椒做的剁椒鱼头味道十分鲜美。

translate.english: The chopped fish head made by mother with red peppers tastes very delicious.

examples.example: 我用红椒搭配各种食材，烹饪出了美味又好看的菜肴。

translate.english: I used red peppers to match with various ingredients and cooked delicious and good-looking dishes.
